author: vinodkv
msg: YARN-1591. Fixed AsyncDispatcher to handle interrupts on shutdown in a sane manner and thus fix failure of TestResourceTrackerService. Contributed by Tsuyoshi Ozawa.

msg: HIVE-6680. Decimal128#update(Decimal128 o, short scale) should adjust the unscaled value. (jitendra, reviewed by Remus Rusanu)

author: jitendra
msg: HIVE-6664. Vectorized variance computation differs from row mode computation. (jitendra, reviewed by Eric Hanson)

msg: [MCHANGES-266] It is not possible to disable the reports in submodules
